plot: "Strong bodies fight, that weak bodies may be nourished" is the motto of the Notre Dame Boxing Team which, since 1931, has been fighting poverty in Bangladesh through its annual charity tournament called "The Bengal Bouts."
title: Strong Bodies Fight
plot_es: "Strong bodies fight, that weak bodies may be nourished" is the motto of the Notre Dame Boxing Team which, since 1931, has been fighting poverty in Bangladesh through its annual charity tournament called "The Bengal Bouts."
plot_en: "Strong bodies fight, that weak bodies may be nourished" is the motto of the Notre Dame Boxing Team which, since 1931, has been fighting poverty in Bangladesh through its annual charity tournament called "The Bengal Bouts."
